languages.text: Праведная служба Империуму далеко не всегда требует громкого подвига. Многие арбитры посвящают всю жизнь круглосуточному бдению за сохранностью десятины на планетах, подобных Летусу.

traits.locale_text: Праведная служба Империуму далеко не всегда требует громкого подвига. Многие арбитры посвящают всю жизнь круглосуточному бдению за сохранностью десятины на планетах, подобных Летусу.

languages.text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.
languages.original_text: Праведная служба Империуму далеко не всегда требует громкого подвига. Многие арбитры посвящают всю жизнь круглосуточному бдению за сохранностью десятины на планетах, подобных Летусу.

traits.locale_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'a dürüstçe hizmet etmek için daima şanlı eylemler gerçekleştirmek gerekmez. Pek çok Yargıcı, yaşantılarını Leethus gibi depolanan aşarın ne pahasına olursa olsun korunmak zorunda olduğu gezegenlerde her gün nöbet tutarak geçirir.
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk'a dürüstçe hizmet etmek için daima şanlı eylemler gerçekleştirmek gerekmez. Pek çok Yargıcı, yaşantılarını Leethus gibi depolanan aşarın ne pahasına olursa olsun korunmak zorunda olduğu gezegenlerde her gün nöbet tutarak geçirir.

languages.text: 帝国への正しい奉仕は、華々しい栄光の偉業を伴うとは限らない。多くのアービトレイタ―は、リーザスのような惑星で、貯蔵された租税をいかなる犠牲を払ってでも守るために、日々休むことなく監視を続け、一生を費やすのだ。
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: 帝国への正しい奉仕は、華々しい栄光の偉業を伴うとは限らない。多くのアービトレイタ―は、リーザスのような惑星で、貯蔵された租税をいかなる犠牲を払ってでも守るために、日々休むことなく監視を続け、一生を費やすのだ。

languages.text: Der aufrechte Dienst für das Imperium ist nicht immer mit ruhmreichen Taten verbunden. Viele Arbitratoren verbringen ihr ganzes Leben damit, auf Planeten wie Leethus tagein, tagaus Wache zu halten, um den heiligen Zehnt mit allen Mitteln zu schützen.
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: Der aufrechte Dienst für das Imperium ist nicht immer mit ruhmreichen Taten verbunden. Viele Arbitratoren verbringen ihr ganzes Leben damit, auf Planeten wie Leethus tagein, tagaus Wache zu halten, um den heiligen Zehnt mit allen Mitteln zu schützen.

languages.text: Servir l'Imperium ne se résume pas qu'à accomplir des actes de bravoure. De nombreux arbitrators consacrent leur vie à veiller jour et nuit sur des planètes comme celle de Leethus, où la dîme doit être protégée à tout prix.
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: Servir l'Imperium ne se résume pas qu'à accomplir des actes de bravoure. De nombreux arbitrators consacrent leur vie à veiller jour et nuit sur des planètes comme celle de Leethus, où la dîme doit être protégée à tout prix.

languages.text: El servicio leal al Imperium no siempre conlleva ilustres actos de gloria. Muchos Arbitrator pasan todas sus vidas vigilando cada día planetas como Leethus, donde el diezmo debe protegerse a toda costa.
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: El servicio leal al Imperium no siempre conlleva ilustres actos de gloria. Muchos Arbitrator pasan todas sus vidas vigilando cada día planetas como Leethus, donde el diezmo debe protegerse a toda costa.

languages.text: 为帝国效忠并不总是意味着赫赫战功。许多法务官终其一生都在利瑟斯这样的行星上坚守岗位，不惜一切代价确保神圣什一税得到应有的守护。
languages.original_text: Righteous service to the Imperium does not always entail illustrious acts of glory. Many Arbitrators spend their entire lives keeping watch day in and day out on planets such as Leethus, where the stored tithe must be protected at all costs.

traits.locale_text: 为帝国效忠并不总是意味着赫赫战功。许多法务官终其一生都在利瑟斯这样的行星上坚守岗位，不惜一切代价确保神圣什一税得到应有的守护。
